fokus 0.0.9006
  • Reference

Get correct skill question answer number

Source: R/fokus.gen.R
skill_question_answer_nr.Rd

Note that

  • canton is ignored if level = "federal".

  • it is considered to be a non-proposal-specific skill question if proposal_nr = NULL (usually the case at elections).

skill_question_answer_nr(
  q_supplemental,
  skill_question_nr,
  level = c("cantonal", "federal"),
  canton = cantons,
  proposal_nr = NULL
)

Arguments

q_supplemental

Supplemental date-specific questionnaire data. A list. See read_q_supplemental().
skill_question_nr

The skill question number. An integer scalar.
level

The political level. One of

  • "cantonal"

  • "federal"
canton

A valid FOKUS canton. One of

  • "aargau"
proposal_nr

The proposal number. An integer scalar.

Value

An integer scalar.

Examples

skill_question_answer_nr(q_supplemental = read_q_supplemental("2018-09-23"),
                         skill_question_nr = 2,
                         level = "cantonal",
                         canton = "aargau",
                         proposal_nr = 1)
